content: संस्तंभ् {c5c} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> ({%<ab>caus.</ab>%} also) {@--1@} To stop, restrain, control; प्रयत्नसंस्तंभितविक्रियाणां कथंचिदीशा मनसां बभूवुः <ls>Ku. 3. 34.</ls> {@--2@} To paralyze, benumb; <ls>Ku. 3. 73.</ls> {@--3@} To take heart or courage, cheer up, compose, collect (oneself); देवि संस्तंभयात्मानं <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} To make firm or immoveable; <ls>Bg. 3. 43.</ls> {@--5@} To support, prop up. {@--6@} To confirm, establish, corroborate.
